info.name: Completely No Hud Just Dance Now
info.description: A completely no hud version of Just Dance Now. For those who can't find a no hud version of a song but can record. (Sound effects are still in, you'll have to put the music over in a video editor!) Thanks to egorvl for providing a simpler code for this.
info.additionalInfo: -Fixed VIP Label appearing during the dance
